title: Total work from W to Z

content.question: What is the total work done on the gas as it goes from state <math alttext="W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>W</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> to state <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Z</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="negative P sub 0, times V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative 2 P sub 0, times V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative 4 P sub 0,times V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative 2 P sub 0, times V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
